title: France panorama. [No. 73/02]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: European road links - President Pompidou and King Baudouin inaugurate the Paris-Brussels thruway. Racers - the racing car and motorcycle show. Long live the pedestrian - in a Paris street given back to the pedestrians, shopkeepers exhibit tableware. 2. Literary prizes: Christopher Franck, Renaudot 1972 - English by birth, French by adoption, Christopher Franck wins this year’s Renaudot prize. 3. The arts: Monet the caricaturist - Claude Monet’s caricatures at the Marmottan Museum in Paris. Ossip Zadkine - retrospect show of the works of the sculptor Zadkine.
